name: BlaZing Robo
description:
120 seconds is all you have. Collect power-ups and kill as many enemies as you can before your energy runs out.

This game was made for the KO!! 72-Hour Slam-Jam

Extra Assets:

Sound effects from freesound.org and opengameart.org/

Music by FrostyAvo / Tetraonid

Game made by:

Amy Lillya

FrostyAvo / Tetraonid
